DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Burned creatures take #b10% of their Maximum HP as damage at the end of their turn. Burn is reduced by #b1 each turn.
Pay this cards #yEmpower cost for a bonus effect. NL If a card cannot be #yEmpowered, gain 1 #yMana of it's type instead.
Take less damage from all sources. #yPrismatic #yBarrier is lost when #yHail subsides
Play the top X cards that cost less than this in your draw pile and #yExhaust them.
#yWeather: At the end of your turn random enemies take damage.
